name: BudgetDIYHomeTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get inspired with our 2-minute budget DIY and decorating tips if you want a pretty home without breaking the bank! Home improvement doesn't have to cost a fortune. After 7 years and 470 articles later, at Snazzy Little Things, we have a few tricks up our sleeve on how to get a high-end look in your home...for less. 

What we talk about: 

* 6 Tips: How to Prioritize Your Home Improvement Projects
* 12 ways to make your kitchen luxe for less
* Which home projects have paid off during resale
* When to hire it out
* Room flip challenges
* My favorite places to shop 
* How to painting furniture & cabinets
* Favorite products (paint, types of paint, tools, flooring)
* Easy ways to do (________) 
* Our $95 kitchen remodel 
* Many, many more...

Download our skill to help you think the same way and identify low-cost, high impact projects to beautify your home and improve resale value.

The blog: SnazzyLittleThings.com 
Instagram: SnazzyLittleThings
Facebook: SnazzyLittleThings
Pinterest SnazzyThings
& Twitter: SnazzyThings
Email: Jeanette@snazzylittlethings.com
priv:
